```{r}
data = read.csv("gagnasafn_ibudarhusnaedi.csv", header  = T, sep = ";")
#remove those that are not in capital region
capitalArea = c(0000,1000,1100,1300,1400,1604,1606)
data = data[data$svfn %in% capitalArea,]

#remove variables we won't use
delete = names(data)[c(1,5,6,7,10,11,12,13,14,15,17,18,20,21,25,26,38,40,41,42,44,47,50,52,53)]
data = data[,-which(names(data) %in% delete)]
dim(data)
```
